event.text: A wooden chest lays half burried in a pit not far from the road. You soon find the chest is shut fast, a heavy lock fitted around its hasp.

outcome.text: You attempt to forcely break the weakest point of the chest but to no aveil.
You focus all your might in a bid to break open the chest. However, it appears the chest is far sturdier than you, as a poorly launched kick badly twists an ankle upon impact.
You focus all your might in a bid to break open the chest. A perfectly honed strike causes the chest to burst open, spilling coins out onto the ground.
Breaking such a thick lock is no easy feat, nor is there guarantee the chest holds anything of use. It's best to leave it be and focus on getting home.
